2020-01-26 retro

Look back at fragments of the day

Steamed Chinese pork bun and a strong cuppa for breakfast.

A day of catching up on old things.

After cleaning the house I decided to start clearing out my 'Watch later' on YouTube:

  • Our Norwegian Tiny Home
  • Oldest Inn(1958)
  • The Gates of the City of London
  • Londons Lost Railways-Mill Hill East
  • The Unfinished Northern Line

Listened & watched Sam Aaron live coding an ambient electro set w/ Sonic Pi followed by an hour of brian eno - thursday afternoon (14 video paintings 1981-1984).

Finished Normal: A Novel by Warren Ellis, and started A Burglar's Guide to the City by Geoff Manaugh.

Meta
